721984f-a.title: Manhattan: Old Slip - Front Street
721984f-a.text:
Old Slip, north side, west from but not including Front, to, but not including Water Streets. The view shows the rear of Hook and Ladder Company No. 15, in the centre of Old Slip, between Water and Front Streets. On the left is seen the Second and Third Aves., Elevated on Pearl Street.
NEG # 3643  October 5, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
721984f-a.folder: Old Slip & Front Street, Manhattan, NY

719897f-a.title: Manhattan: Front Street - Old Slip
719897f-a.text:
Front Street, east side, at Old Slip. The view also shows Old Slip, north side, east from and including Front, to but not including South Streets. Front Street is arbitrarily set to run north and south
between Coenties Slip and the Brooklyn Bridge.
July 8, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
719897f-a.folder: Front Street & Old Slip, Manhattan, NY

721977f-a.title: Manhattan: Old Slip - Front Street
721977f-a.text:
Old Slip, north side, west from South, to and including Front Streets. Also shown is South Street, at, adjoining and north of
the N.W. corner of Old Slip.
October 13, 1939.
P. L. Sperr.
721977f-a.folder: Old Slip & Front Street, Manhattan, NY

721985f-a.title: Manhattan: Old Slip - Front Street
721985f-a.text:
Old Slip, north side, west from but not including Front, to, but not including Water Streets. The view shows the rear of Hook and Ladder No. 15, in the centre of Old Slip. Over-towering all is the Bank of
Manhattan Building, at No. 4O Wall Street.
April 10, 1930.
Ewing Galloway.
721985f-a.folder: Old Slip & Front Street, Manhattan, NY

721988f-b.title: Manhattan: Old Slip - Front Street
721988f-b.text:
(1)
Old Slip, north side, west from but not including Front Street,
to and including Hanover Square.
July s, 1939.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, from a different angle.
July s, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
721988f-b.folder: Old Slip & Front Street, Manhattan, NY

O1d Slip, at, adjoining and west of the S.W. corner of Front Strset.

719896f-b.title: Manhattan: Front Street - Old Slip
719896f-b.text:
(1)
Front Street, at, adjoining and south of the S.W. corner of Old Slip. The view also shows Old Slip, at, adjoining and west of
the S.W. corner of Front Street.
July 26, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, another view.
May 11, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
An aerial view from the Seamens Institute and showing the
same buildings.
August 4, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.

733321f-a.title: Street scenes - Sandwich man [advertising buying of old gold.]
733321f-a.text:
"Sandwich man"; sign bearer, advertising the buying of old gold at Front
Street and Old Slip.
September 6, 1934,
L Sperr.
733321f-a.folder: Front Street and Old Slip, Manhattan, N.Y.

719895f-a.title: Manhattan: Front Street - Old Slip
719895f-a.text:
Front Street, south from and including Old Slip, to and including Coenties Slip. (Front Street, is arbitrarily set to run north and south
from Coenties Slip, to the Brooklyn Bridge).
March 11, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
719895f-a.folder: Front Street & Old Slip, Manhattan, NY

721980f-a.title: Manhattan: Old Slip - Front Street
721980f-a.text:
Old Slip, north side, at Front Street.  Also shown is Front Street, west side, north from and including Old Slip, to and including
Maiden Lane.
August 4, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
721980f-a.folder: Old Slip & Front Street, Manhattan, NY

721981f-a.title: Manhattan: Old Slip - Front Street
721981f-a.text:
(1)
Old Slip at the N.W. corner of Front Street. Also shown is Front Street, west side, north from Old Slip, to and including
Wall Street.
July 8, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, showing a further view westward on Old Slip.
July s, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
721981f-a.folder: Old Slip & Front Street, Manhattan, NY

721982f-a.title: Manhattan: Old Slip - Front Street
721982f-a.text:
Old Slip, south side, at Front Street. Also shown is Front Street, at, adjoining and south of the S.E. corner of Old Slip.
July 26, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
721982f-a.folder: Old Slip & Front Street, Manhattan, NY

721983f-a.title: Manhattan: Old Slip - Front Street
721983f-a.text:
Old Slip, north side, west from Front, to and including Water Streets. Also shown is Front Street, at and adjoining the N.W.
corner of Old Slip.
About 1922.
Gift of E. M. Jenks.
721983f-a.folder: Old Slip & Front Street, Manhattan, NY
